This page contains the list of links pointing to the different chapters in the course notes. 

## Chapters

```{r chpt-table, echo=FALSE}
s_cn_url <- 'https://charlotte-ngs.github.io/lbgfs2020/articles/'
tbl_chpt <- tibble::tibble(Chapter = c(0, 1),
                           Title   = c(
                             "Preface",
                             "Introduction"),
                           Link    = c(
                             paste0("[html](", s_cn_url, "00_preface.html), [pdf]", s_cn_url, "00_preface.pdf)", collapse = ""),
                             ""))
knitr::kable(tbl_chpt)
```
